Casser et al.Â¶

As part of our paper we try to reproduce other state-of-the-art approaches for EM semantic segmentation that do not provide code. In this case the following paper has been reproduced:

Vincent Casser, Kai Kang, Hanspeter Pfister, and Daniel Haehn, "Fast mitochondria
segmentation for connectomics", arXiv preprint arXiv:1812.06024 (2018)

[Paper] [Our code]

We have prepared two templates:

  • casser_template_V0.py : exact parameters and training workflow as described in the paper.

  • casser_template_V1.py : changes made respect to V0 with which we have achieved better results.

The implementation is based in one file:

  • 2D U-Net: proposed 2D U-Net (recently submitted by the authors here).

Here is a picture of the network extracted from the original paper:
